features.title: GroupDocs.Comparison at a glance
features.description: API for comparing and diff viewing across PDF, Word, Excel, source code files, and more.

feature_1.title: Intuitive diff view result
feature_1.content: Analyze changes easily with highlighted differences in a single-document report.

feature_2.title: Efficient change review process
feature_2.content: Accept or reject changes with visually distinct modifications for easy decision-making.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Answers to most commonly asked questions.

item_1.question: Does the GroupDocs.Comparison library need any other third-party software to manipulate documents?
item_1.answer: GroupDocs.Comparison does not require any external software to be installed such as Adobe Acrobat, Microsoft Office, or any other.

item_2.question: Can I try the GroupDocs.Comparison library before purchasing it?
item_2.answer: Yes, you can try GroupDocs.Comparison without buying a license. Once installed without a license, the library works in trial mode. In this mode, trial badges are added to the resultant document, and it is trimmed to the first 3 pages. If you wish to test GroupDocs.Comparison without the limitations of the trial version, you can also request a 30-day temporary license. For more details, see

item_3.question: What licenses do you have?
item_3.answer: We offer several license types to fit the needs of particular developers or companies. License types depend on the number of developers, the number of developer site locations, and whether you need to deliver our SDK/API to your end customers. Alternatively, you can choose Metered licenses based on monthly usage of the product. Learn more at

cloud_links.description: Incorporate document comparison capabilities into any application using our cloud-based REST API.

item_1.content: Work with cURL RESTful document comparison API to compare Word, Excel, PowerPoint and other popular file formats.

item_2.content: Add powerful document comparison capabilities in .NET applications using Cloud SDK for .NET. Compare DOCX, XLSX, PPTX and more.

item_3.content: Add high fidelity document comparison features to your java applications with specially designed document comparison SDK for Java.

index-content-net.head_title: .NET Document Comparison Library | Compare Docs for Text & Style
index-content-net.head_description: .NET API to compare document style & content. Compare documents of multiple supported formats for the difference to identify changes between files.
index-content-net.title: Compare documents with ease in your .NET solutions
index-content-net.description: Build .NET applications with a flexible document comparison API that enables file comparison by content and style across various document formats.
index-content-net.overview_description: API to compare differences between documents in .NET applications

overview_feature_1.title: File comparison in C#
overview_feature_1.description: Detect differences between source and target files for changes at paragraphs, words, and character levels. Identify styling and formatting changes like bold, italic, underlines, strike-troughs, font types, etc.

overview_feature_2.title: Most popular file and document formats are supported
overview_feature_2.description: GroupDocs.Comparison API allows for efficient document comparison across a wide range of formats, including PDF, HTML, emails, Microsoft Office documents (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, Visio), various image types (JPEG, PNG, GIF, BMP), text files, and more.

overview_feature_3.title: Apply or reject changes easily
overview_feature_3.description: Each difference identified in the compared documents using the GroupDocs.Comparison API can be selectively applied or rejected, enabling customization before exporting to the final output document.

overview_feature_4.title: Comparison summary report
overview_feature_4.description: Generate a summary report of differences, detailing all the changes found in the compared documents, and save it for reference.

features.title: GroupDocs.Comparison features
features.description: Easily compare PDF and Office documents, images and other formats

feature_1.title: Easy to use document comparison
feature_1.content: Aanalyze and identify differences between two documents.

feature_2.title: Compare multiple documents
feature_2.content: Simultaneously analyze and identify differences across multiple documents.

feature_3.title: Supported formats
feature_3.content: Compatible with over 50 widely-used document formats from various categories, ensuring broad applicability.

feature_4.title: Accept or reject changes
feature_4.content: Ð¡lear visual display of detected changes, complete with options to either accept or reject these modifications.

feature_5.title: Generate previews
feature_5.content: Ability to save comparison results as image previews for easy reference and sharing.

feature_6.title: Content comparison
feature_6.content: Conduct thorough text comparisons at various levels - including line-by-line, paragraph, word, and character - with highlighted differences for better clarity.

feature_7.title: Style and formatting comparison
feature_7.content: Detects and highlights alterations in document formatting and style, ensuring comprehensive review.

feature_8.title: Flexible metadata settings
feature_8.content: Preserve metadata from source or target files, or customize it according to user preferences.

feature_9.title: Password protection
feature_9.content: Analyze password-protected documents and secure the output document with password encryption for added security.

feature_10.title: Selective page comparison
feature_10.content: Load and compare specific sections or pages of a document for targeted analysis.

feature_11.title: Display comments
feature_11.content: Choose to display or hide comments when loading the source document, offering greater control over the comparison process.

index-content-java.title: Compare and view file differences using Java API
index-content-java.description: Develop Java applications with a highly configurable document comparison library to compare similar document formats, including files, their content, and text style.
index-content-java.overview_description: API to compare differences between documents in Java applications

overview_feature_1.title: File comparison in Java
overview_feature_1.description: Detect changes between source and target files at paragraph, word, and character levels. Identify styling and formatting changes such as bold, italic, underlines, strike-throughs, font types, and more.

overview_feature_2.title: Vast number of supported formats
overview_feature_2.description: With the GroupDocs.Comparison API, you can easily compare documents of multiple supported formats. This includes PDF, HTML, email, Microsoft Office Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, OneNote, Visio diagrams, texts, JPEG, PNG, GIF, and BMP images, as well as many other formats.

overview_feature_3.title: Apply or reject changes easily
overview_feature_3.description: Every difference between the compared documents can be applied or rejected and then exported to the output document.

overview_feature_4.title: Comparison summary report
overview_feature_4.description: Generate a summary report that lists all changes in the compared documents.

features.title: GroupDocs.Comparison features
features.description: Easily compare PDF and Office documents, images and other formats

feature_1.title: Easy to use document comparison
feature_1.content: Easily analyze and pinpoint differences between two documents.

feature_2.title: Compare multiple documents
feature_2.content: Simultaneously examine and highlight variances across multiple documents.

feature_3.title: Supported formats
feature_3.content: Compatibility with over 50 widely-used document formats from diverse categories.

feature_4.title: Accept or reject changes
feature_4.content: Clear visualization of identified changes, with options to accept or reject modifications.

feature_5.title: Generate previews
feature_5.content: Capability to save comparison results as image previews.

feature_6.title: Content comparison
feature_6.content: Thorough comparison of text content on various levels - including line-by-line, paragraph, word, and character analysis, with emphasis on alterations.

feature_7.title: Style comparison
feature_7.content: Ability to detect and highlight alterations in formatting and style elements.

feature_8.title: Set metadata
feature_8.content: Option to retain metadata from source or target files, or permit user-defined metadata settings.

feature_9.title: Password protection
feature_9.content: Facilitates analysis of password-protected documents and enables password protection for the resultant documents.

feature_10.title: Compare specific pages
feature_10.content: Load and compare specific sections or pages of a document as required.

feature_11.title: Display comments
feature_11.content: Flexibility to display or conceal comments when loading the source document.

overview_feature_1.title: Detailed output reports
overview_feature_1.description: GroupDocs.Comparison identifies changes in document content (characters, words, paragraphs, tables, charts), as well as, changes in document style. It provides customers with a resulting report that contains rich information about differences, their number, and type.

overview_feature_2.title: Most popular file and document formats are supported
overview_feature_2.description: With GroupDocs.Comparison API you can efficiently compare documents of any supported formats like PDF, HTML, e-mail, Microsoft Office Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, OneNote, Visio diagrams, texts, JPEG, PNG, GIF, and BMP images as well as many other formats.

overview_feature_3.title: Documentation and examples
overview_feature_3.description: There is already a lot of documentation on using Comparison library on different platforms with code examples, so you donâ€™t have to think hard about how to work with GroupDocs.Comparison API in your Node.js application.

features.title: GroupDocs.Comparison for Node.js features
features.description: Easily compare PDF and Office documents, images and other formats

feature_1.title: Easy to use document comparison
feature_1.content: Analyze and identify differences within two documents.

feature_2.title: Compare multiple documents
feature_2.content: Analyze and identify differences within multiple documents simultaneously.

feature_3.title: Supported formats
feature_3.content: Supports more than 50 popular document formats from various categories.

feature_4.title: Accept or reject changes
feature_4.content: Clear visual representation of identified changes, providing the option to accept or reject modifications.

feature_5.title: Generate previews
feature_5.content: Save the results of the comparison as images.

feature_6.title: Content comparison
feature_6.content: Compare text content line-by-line, by paragraphs, by words, by characters. Highlight the changes.

feature_7.title: Style comparison
feature_7.content: Detect changes in formatting and styles.

feature_8.title: Set metadata
feature_8.content: Keep metadata from either the source or target files or allow it to be specified by users.

feature_9.title: Password protection
feature_9.content: Analyze the encrypted documents, or secure the resulting document with a password.

feature_10.title: Compare specific pages
feature_10.content: Load just the particular sections or pages of the document.

feature_11.title: Display comments
feature_11.content: When loading the source document you can choose whether to hide or show comments.
